RationalPiano.NoteOut
Interface INoteOutput

All Known Implementing Classes:
NoteOutput
public interface INoteOutput

Manages note output for MIDI and OSC Allows to turn on/off notes/voices on a midi channel / osc port and to de/activate sustain

Version:
1.01
Author:
Fabian Ehrentraud
Licence:
Licensed under the Open Software License (OSL 3.0)
Date:
2011-01-28

Nested Class Summary
static class INoteOutput.outputModes
          Possible modes of note message outputs: either only via MIDI, only via OSC or both
 
Method Summary
 void noteOff(int midiNoteNumber)
          Turns off the given note via MIDI and/or OSC
 void noteOn(int midiNoteNumber, double velocity)
          Turns on the given note via MIDI and/or OSC
 void sustain(double sustain)
          Sets the value of the sustain (damper pedal).
 

Method Detail

noteOn

void noteOn(int midiNoteNumber,
            double velocity)
Turns on the given note via MIDI and/or OSC

Parameters:
midiNoteNumber - The MIDI note number to turn on
velocity - Initial note velocity; 0<=velocity<=1

noteOff

void noteOff(int midiNoteNumber)
Turns off the given note via MIDI and/or OSC

Parameters:
midiNoteNumber - The MIDI note number to turn off

sustain

void sustain(double sustain)
Sets the value of the sustain (damper pedal).

Parameters:
sustain - Value of the sustain parameter; 0<=sustain<=1
